channel.title: Comments on: Foolishness and Shame
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description:
Allow me to wave my magic scepter and absolve you of any guilt. ;) I put my writing out there for people to read, so you aren't intruding.
So how does "fantasy shopping" work? Do you go to eBay and search for "Excalibur" or "time machine"?
item.content:encoded:
Allow me to wave my magic scepter and absolve you of any guilt. üòâ I put my writing out there for people to read, so you aren’t intruding.

So how does “fantasy shopping” work? Do you go to eBay and search for “Excalibur” or “time machine”?

item.title: By: Lisa
item.dc:creator: Lisa
item.description: Strange but true: I found you while engaged in a pastime I call √¢‚Ç¨≈ìfantasy shopping.√¢‚Ç¨¬ù Led here I began reading and felt compelled to let you know I couldn√¢‚Ç¨t continue long. Not for lack of interest, but for feeling guilt (evil Catholic vestige!) over somehow intruding more intimately than a stranger should. So here you have it. A sincere compliment to your candid writing √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù certainly among your comments this can√¢‚Ç¨t be the strangest. :)
